verses.verse: He cried <S%H7121><s%> also in mine ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Cause them that have charge <S%H6486><s%> over the city <S%H5892><s%> to draw near, <S%H7126><s%> even every man <S%H376><s%> with his destroying <S%H4892><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> men <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the way <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the higher <S%H5945><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> lieth <S%H6437><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> a slaughter <S%H4660><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen, <S%H906><s%> with a writer's <S%H5608><s%> inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side: <S%H4975><s%> and they went in, <S%H935><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the cherub, <S%H3742><s%> whereupon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> he was, <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house. <S%H1004><s%> And he called <S%H7121><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen, <S%H906><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had the writer's <S%H5608><s%> inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side; <S%H4975><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Go through <S%H5674><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and set <S%H8427><s%> a mark <S%H8420><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the foreheads <S%H4696><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> that sigh <S%H584><s%> and that cry <S%H602><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that be done <S%H6213><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

And to the others <S%H428><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> in mine hearing, <S%H241><s%> Go <S%H5674><s%> ye after <S%H310><s%> him through the city, <S%H5892><s%> and smite: <S%H5221><s%> let not <S%H408><s%> your eye <S%H5869><s%> spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> have ye pity: <S%H2550><s%>

Slay <S%H2026><s%> utterly <S%H4889><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> and young, <S%H970><s%> both maids, <S%H1330><s%> and little children, <S%H2945><s%> and women: <S%H802><s%> but come not near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H5921><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> is the mark; <S%H8420><s%> and begin <S%H2490><s%> at my sanctuary. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4720><s%> Then they began <S%H2490><s%> at the ancient <S%H2205><s%> men <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were before <S%H6440><s%> the house. <S%H1004><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the courts <S%H2691><s%> with the slain: <S%H2491><s%> go ye forth. <S%H3318><s%> And they went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> while they were slaying <S%H5221><s%> them, and I <S%H589><s%> was left, <S%H7604><s%> that I fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> and cried, <S%H2199><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> wilt thou <S%H859><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in thy pouring out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H853><s%> of thy fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem? <S%H3389><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, The iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> full <S%H4390><s%> of perverseness: <S%H4297><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> seeth <S%H7200><s%> not. <S%H369><s%>

And as for me <S%H589><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I have pity, <S%H2550><s%> but I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon their head. <S%H7218><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen, <S%H906><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had the inkhorn <S%H7083><s%> by his side, <S%H4975><s%> reported <S%H7725><s%> the matter, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> me.
